thread.title: Daughters birthday treat
thread.title_full: Daughters birthday treat - Review of The Montcalm London Marble Arch, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: 52carella
title: Daughters birthday treat
text: We have stayed at this hotel several times and it never disappoints!! Izabella from Guest experience, looked after us so well , from booking, checking in and even balloons, cake and soft drinks for my daughter in our room on arrival , our room was beautifully maintained throughout our stay with all our requests met . Would definitely recommend
